body_html:
Ah unfortunately someone internally just submitted this change yesterday. Should sync soon. Apologies :(

From now on can you create an issue with your in progress gradients with "c++ gradient" in the title. I will ask internal folks to do the same, this way we can avoid stepping on toes due to sync latency.

body:
Ah unfortunately someone internally just submitted this change yesterday.  Should sync soon. Apologies :(

From now on can you create an issue with your in progress gradients with "c++ gradient" in the title. I will ask internal folks to do the same, this way we can avoid stepping on toes due to sync latency.
